scripts.native: yarn build && cd apps/expo && yarn start
scripts.web: yarn build && cd apps/next && yarn next
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app --exclude sb-react -pi run build
scripts.upgrade:tamagui: manypkg upgrade tamagui 1.0.1-beta.181 && manypkg upgrade @tamagui 1.0.1-beta.181 && manypkg upgrade tamagui-loader 1.0.1-beta.181 && manypkg upgrade react-native-web-lite 1.0.1-beta.181
scripts.tests: yarn build && cd apps/tests && yarn test
scripts.rm:nodemodule: rm -rf node_modules apps/expo/node_modules apps/next/node_modules packages/ui/node_modules yarn.lock apps/storybook-react/node_modules apps/storybook-react-native/node_modules apps/storybook-react/dist
